Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    soc.message.SOCSimpleAction.TRADE_SUCCESSFUL
    Not used in v2.0.00 or higher; bots instead receive a SOCBankTrade which has their player number.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    soc.debug.D.ebugPrint(String)
    Use D.ebugPrintINFO(String) added in v2.4.50
    soc.disableDebug.D.ebugPrint(String)
    Use D.ebugPrintINFO(String) added in v2.4.50
    soc.debug.D.ebugPrintln()
    Use D.ebugPrintlnINFO() added in v2.4.50
    soc.disableDebug.D.ebugPrintln()
    Use D.ebugPrintlnINFO() added in v2.4.50
    soc.debug.D.ebugPrintln(String)
    Use D.ebugPrintlnINFO(String) added in v2.4.50
    soc.disableDebug.D.ebugPrintln(String)
    Use D.ebugPrintlnINFO(String) added in v2.4.50
    soc.game.SOCBoardLarge.getHexLayout()
    soc.game.SOCBoardLarge.getHexNumFromCoord(int)
    soc.game.SOCBoardLarge.getNumberLayout()
    soc.game.SOCGame.getResetOldGameState()
    Use SOCGame.getOldGameState() to get the old game state without usage restrictions
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToGame(String, SOCMessage)
    Use SOCServer.messageToGame(String, boolean, SOCMessage) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToGame(String, String)
    Use SOCServer.messageToGame(String, boolean, String) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToGameKeyed(SOCGame, boolean, String)
    Use SOCServer.messageToGameKeyed(SOCGame, boolean, boolean, String) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToGameKeyed(SOCGame, boolean, String, Object...)
    Use SOCServer.messageToGameKeyed(SOCGame, boolean, boolean, String, Object...) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToGameWithMon(String, SOCMessage)
    Use SOCServer.messageToGameWithMon(String, boolean, SOCMessage) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToPlayer(Connection, SOCMessage)
    Use SOCServer.messageToPlayer(Connection, String, int, SOCMessage) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToPlayer(Connection, String, String)
    Use SOCServer.messageToPlayer(Connection, String, int, String) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToPlayerKeyed(Connection, String, String)
    Use SOCServer.messageToPlayerKeyed(Connection, String, int, String) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.server.SOCServer.messageToPlayerKeyed(Connection, String, String, Object...)
    Use SOCServer.messageToPlayerKeyed(Connection, String, int, String, Object...) instead, starting at v2.4.50
    soc.game.SOCBoardLarge.setHexLayout(int[])
    soc.game.SOCBoardLarge.setNumberLayout(int[])
    soc.message.SOCStatusMessage.toCmd(int, int, String)
    Use SOCStatusMessage.buildForVersion(int, int, String) instead, which returns a message object instead of a String
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    soc.robot.SOCRobotClient(String, int, String, String, String)
    In v2.2.00 and newer, use the SOCRobotClient.SOCRobotClient(ServerConnectInfo, String, String) constructor instead:
    new SOCRobotClient(new ServerConnectInfo(h, p, co), nn, pw);
